CrazyChess.logic

Class ExtraChecksAndTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • CrazyChess.logic.ExtraChecksAndTools

  • public class ExtraChecksAndTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to perform some extra checks and to provide some extra tools that might be useful further in the project. This class might be very useful for people making the AI because of methods like canCapture, capturableBy and possibleGamestatesAfterNextMove. This class also holds methods for checking for checks and checkmates.
